column4: can anyone tell me how to prevent a network card from automatically using saved wireless settings when it is plugged in?
you can right click on the network manager icon and edit your connection
okay, i got that far, but i have 2 network cards, 1 built in and 1 external usb. every time i plug the usb card in, it starts trying to use the saved settings from the built in card.
you should be able to choose which one is enabled in edit
